item.title: 1Q'18 Conference Call Highlights
item.description: Service Companies Baker Hughes Halliburton Superior Energy Services US Silica Upstream Companies Chevron Encana ExxonMobil Noble Energy QEP Resources Turn mobile devices horizontal for figures to display properly. Service Companies Baker Hughes See global oil demand rising at a steady pace driven by improved GDP outlook in the United States and Europe.
